plot: In this Dior campaign video by director John Cameron Mitchell for the "L.A.dy Dior" handbag, Marion Cotillard parodies the real-life role we have all come to know so well: the crazy actress.
title: L.A.dy Dior
plot_es: In this Dior campaign video by director John Cameron Mitchell for the "L.A.dy Dior" handbag, Marion Cotillard parodies the real-life role we have all come to know so well: the crazy actress.
